Modifies the coordinates of a Geometry which contains a single coordinate list.

Description copied from interface: GeometryEditor.GeometryEditorOperation
"Modifies" a Geometry by returning a new Geometry with a modification. The returned Geometry might be the same as the Geometry passed in.
Specified by:
edit in interface GeometryEditor.GeometryEditorOperation

edit

public abstract com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate[] edit(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate[] coordinates,
                                                              com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry geometry,
                                                              GeometryEditor editor)
Edits the coordinate list from a geometry.
Parameters:
coordinates - the coordinate list to operate on
geometry - the geometry containing the coordinate list
Returns:
an edited coordinate list (which may be the same as the input)
